title: Strip club worker’s decapitated head thrown from 12th storey flat
text:
Elizaveta, 19, worked at a strip club before her death (Picture: east2west news)

The decapitated head of a strip club worker was found by horrified children after being thrown from a 12th storey flat in Russia.

Teenage witnesses described how first the woman’s blood-stained clothing was thrown from the block of flats, on Bogomyagkova Street, in Chita, eastern Siberia.

She has since been been identified only as Elizaveta, 19, who worked at a strip club called Zazhigalka, a Russian chain, in the area.

A man, 38, has been arrested on suspicion of throwing her body parts from a balcony after police smashed down the door of his apartment.

Local media reports that Elizaveta was his girlfriend, although this is unconfirmed.

A friend stated that she had grown up in an orphanage (Picture: east2west news)

Her body was found by children playing outside (Picture: east2west news)

Igor Shalaev, 15, was playing outside with friends when body parts started falling from the building.

He said: ‘It was very scary. First the clothes were thrown out all covered in blood and then the head.’

Man 'raped pregnant girlfriend to try and kill their unborn baby'

Some human remains landed on the roof covering the 15-storey apartment block’s doorway.

A murder investigation has now been launched, police confirmed.

Officers said in a statement: ‘The dead woman has been identified as a 19 year old citizen of Chita.

A man, 38, has been arrested (Picture: east2west news)

‘The man, born in 1981, who rented an apartment in the same block has been detained and brought to investigators for interrogation.’

Others who live in the block of flats have also been taken in for questioning about the incident, the Russian Investigative Committee said.

While a friend of Elizaveta’s said she was ‘raised in an orphanage’ and lived with her grandmother at the time of her death.

They added: ‘There is no money for her funeral.’

Elizaveta’s social media status at the time of her death read: ‘No-one will die a virgin, life screws everyone.’

description: Murder victim Elizavetas body parts were thrown from a flat on Bogomyagkova Street, in Chita, eastern Siberia, Russia.
